text: brrda phu bricakh thraphy khxng phwk khea nı thang khx ngxallxhˌ læw phwk khea mi hı tidtam sing thi phwk khea bricakh pi sung kar laleik læa kar kx khwam deuxdrxn dı «nan phwk khea ca di rab rangwal khxng phwk khea n phraphupenceakhxng phwk khea læa mimi khwam klaw dı «kæ phwk khea læa thang phwk khea k ca mi seiycı
